SELECT material_main.*, FROM ( select
emm.model_name AS material_model_name, eb.brand_name as brand_name
from erp_material em LEFT JOIN erp_material_model emm ON em.material_model_id = emm.id LEFT JOIN erp_brand eb ON eb.id = em.brand_id where em.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.data_status = 1 ) material_main LEFT JOIN erp_material_img emi ON material_main.id = emi.material_id AND emi.data_status = 1

SELECT material_main.*, FROM ( select
emm.model_name AS material_model_name, eb.brand_name as brand_name
from erp_material em LEFT JOIN erp_material_model emm ON em.material_model_id = emm.id LEFT JOIN erp_brand eb ON eb.id = em.brand_id where em.material_no = #{materialNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.data_status = 1 ) material_main LEFT JOIN erp_material_img emi ON material_main.id = emi.material_id AND emi.data_status = 1
